events.title: Storytime in the Garden
events.curated_description: Bring little listeners for a relaxed storytime followed by a short garden walk. Expect gentle pacing, room to wiggle, and a simple craft to take home. Ideal for parents looking for a calm, screen-free morning activity with a soft start.

events.title: Family Beach Cleanup
events.curated_description: Help keep the shoreline beautiful with an easy, family-friendly cleanup. Volunteers provide bags, guidance, and a short nature chat for kids. Great for older children who like being helpful outdoors and families who prefer early-morning fresh air and a purposeful start.

events.title: Downtown Kids Fun Run
events.curated_description: A short-distance run with a supportive pace, music, and plenty of cheering. Families can walk alongside younger kids, then enjoy snacks afterward. Itâ€™s a lively but manageable morning for active children who like medals, movement, and a quick community high-five.

events.title: Museum Family Day
events.curated_description: Explore hands-on exhibits and rotating discovery stations designed for families. The day includes calm activity corners for younger siblings and optional guided moments for curious kids who like science and history. Plan for a few quiet breaks between exhibits.
